description.value: This operation returns an overview of patient procedures within a time period, marked by startDate and endDate. The overview is optionally filtered by providing episodes of care or condition codings. ## Input The operation has three mandatory inputs, a Patient reference, a start date and a end date. Additionally the operation has two optional inputs: a list of episodes of care and/or a list of condition codings. ### Patient reference Mandatory reference for the patient which the procedure overview is computed for. ### Start date and end date Start- and end date are both mandatory date times, and together determine bounds for which measurements can be used in the patient procedure overview. ### Episode of care list The episode of care list is optional. If episodes of care are provided, these will be used to further filter which care plan/procedure requests are used for the patient procedure overview. ### Condition codings list The condition coding list is optional. If condition codings are provided, only episodes of care matching the condition will be used for the patient procedure overview. ## Output For valid inputs, the server will compute and return a Bundle. The Bundle contains a Parameters resource with dissolved measurement regimes and associated measurements, lists of any CarePlan or ProcedureRequest referenced in the Parameters and lastly OperationOutcome describing any encountered warnings.
